mapper.update: UPDATE review SET custid = #{custid}, storeid = #{storeid}, revtext = #{revtext}, star = #{star} WHERE reviewid = #{reviewid}
mapper.select: SELECT s.storename, o.reservedate, r.revtext, r.star, i.storeimg FROM review r INNER join cust c on c.custid = r.custid INNER join store s on s.storeid = r.storeid INNER join orderlist o on o.custid = c.custid INNER join storeimgs i on i.storeid = s.storeid WHERE c.custid = #{custid} AND i.storeimg LIKE '%1%';
